content: Turning to our three markets in Commercial Aerospace, fourth quarter sales of more than $256 million represented an increase of almost 29% in constant currency when compared to Q4 2021 and up 23% sequentially over the past quarter. In our markets, Commercial Aerospace sales were led by the Airbus A320neo and A350 programs combined with strong growth of about 63% year-over-year for other Commercial Aerospace driven by business jets.
